definition: to hold/to grasp/to support/to maintain/to persevere/to manage/to run (i.e. administer)/to control

chi2 xu4 xing4 zhi2 wu4 zhuang4 tai4

sentences.english: It was tight. so ti lasted a long time .
sentences.chinese: 兩隊不分勝負，所以持續了很長一段時間。

sentences.english: Before I got these, my allergies would turn into weeks-long sinus infections.
sentences.chinese: 在我開始使用前，過敏症狀已變成持續幾周的鼻炎。

sentences.english: The torch will travel the length of Britain during its 70-day relay.
sentences.chinese: 火炬傳遞將在英國國內進行，持續70天。

sentences.english: The patient individualizes commonly blemish, psychogenic disorder duration is in less than of half an year.
sentences.chinese: 病人一般有個性缺陷，心理障礙持續時間在半年以內。

sentences.english: Continuous existence of accommodation space led to well-developed lacustrine transgressive system tracts(LTST).
sentences.chinese: 可容空間持續存在，導致湖侵體系域十分發育。

sentences.english: A few abilities have had the duration of the secondary effects extended, such as Dragon's Talon.
sentences.chinese: 一些技能的附加效果持續時間被延長，如巨龍鉤爪。

sentences.english: I only know whether theGolden Path continues or ends.
sentences.chinese: 我只知道黃金之路是持續還是終止。
然而，寧靜並未持續很久。

sentences.english: By late 1952, the Korean War had been going on for more than two years.
sentences.chinese: 到1952年年底，朝鮮戰爭已經持續了兩年多。

sentences.english: Like the SDGs themselves, cooperatives are people-centred.
sentences.chinese: 合作社與可持續發展目標一樣，也是以人爲本。

sentences.english: I also like that the tech is supposed to be durable, reducing e-waste.
sentences.chinese: 另外，這項技術是可持續耐用的，能減少電損耗。

sentences.english: The natural forest conversation project is an important guarantee for sustainable forest development.
sentences.chinese: 天然林保護工程是森林可持續發展的重要保證。

sentences.english: "Labour won't stand by and let this continue, " David Cunliffe said.
sentences.chinese: 工黨不會坐視不管，任由這種情形持續。

sentences.english: The process continues as a chain reaction with other nuclei.
sentences.chinese: 這個過程和其他核子一起持續一系列反應。

sentences.english: In fact, nothing teaches you sanctification like the life of marriage.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，沒有什麼比持續一生的婚姻更神聖的。

sentences.english: Loud, persistent ringing in the ears, known as tinnitus, can be vexing for its millions of sufferers.
sentences.chinese: 耳朵裏持續嘈雜的聲音使衆多耳鳴患者煩惱不堪。

definition: to continue/to proceed with/to go on with
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
one step further/to move forward a step/further onwards
auxiliary verb introducing future action: may (be able to)/will (cause)/should (enable)/going to
long term/long time/long range (of a forecast)
